definition: absolutely ridiculous (idiom); preposterous/the height of folly
to cut short/extinct/to disappear/to vanish/absolutely/by no means

sentences.english: When we say homosexuality is against nature, this is the biggest nonsense.
sentences.chinese: 若說同性戀是違背自然的，那真是荒謬絕倫了。

sentences.english: Eg. I didn't credit that absurd tale.
sentences.chinese: 我不相信那個荒謬絕倫的故事。

sentences.english: I didn't credit that absurd tale.
sentences.chinese: 我不相信那個荒謬絕倫的故事。

sentences.english: We couldn't accept the excuse he rendered. It was too ridiculous.
sentences.chinese: 我們無法接受他荒謬絕倫的藉口。
